## CKBOptions() function

> This API is provided as a preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function CKBOptions(lang?: Language): {
    family: string[];
    category: string[];
    purpose: string[];
    coord: string[];
    shape: string[];
    channel: string[];
    lom: string[];
    recRate: string[];
};
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  lang | [Language](./knowledge.language.md) | Language of the options. |

<b>Returns:</b>

{ family: string\[\]; category: string\[\]; purpose: string\[\]; coord: string\[\]; shape: string\[\]; channel: string\[\]; lom: string\[\]; recRate: string\[\]; }
